entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and a powerful wizard. He is described as walking back to Harry carrying the head, wearing half-moon spectacles.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister of Magic. He is described as being in a position of authority and trying to stop Dumbledore from using a Portkey.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as the one who Dumbledore is carrying the head back to.

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts and an Auror. She is mentioned as someone that Dumbledore wants Fudge to remove from the school.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is the school where Harry, Dumbledore, and Umbridge work or attend. It is mentioned as a place that Dumbledore needs to return to after meeting with Fudge.

entities.name: portkey
entities.description: A Portkey is an object that allows wizards to travel quickly from one place to another. It is mentioned as something that Dumbledore used without authorization.

relationships.description: Dumbledore orders Fudge to remove Dolores Umbridge from Hogwarts and stop searching for his Care of Magical Creatures teacher.
Dumbledore carries the head back to Harry.
Fudge tries to stop Dumbledore from using a Portkey in front of him.
